name: Cook & Merge
description:
Cook & Merge is the best merge game in town!

Your mission is to merge delicious food to renovate Kate's Cafe and every restaurant in Baker's Valley!

With Grandma's secret recipe book and Buddy the dog, you can save the town.

You will uncover the mysteries to save the town, travel the city, county & land, help Kate's friends, the mayor and the cafe Kate calls home.

Relax in a sunny world, escape from the madness and matters of life into the mystery of our casual free merge games!

Love food games & restaurant games? Cook & Merge is cooking games & puzzle games merged!

In Cook & Merge you’ll:

• COOK tasty food - as Head Chef of Kate’s Cafe!
• MERGE delicious cakes, pies, burgers & more!
• RELAX & merge 100s of foods & recipes
• DISCOVER the mystery puzzle of Grandma’s Recipe Book
• MAKEOVER your cafe restaurant diner food truck and gardens with a unique design
• MULTIPLAYER party in our neighborhood community merging events

Love pies? Cook & Merge is the food game for you!

Play Cook and Merge to merge and serve fun food items and reveal an adventure story in merge games filled with the crazy fever of romance, mystery, love and puzzles!
In this cook and merge game you can explore the world and discovery the secrets of Grandmas diary between merge games!

Cook & Merge is a merge of cooking games and puzzle games, a perfect match! Travel between food destinations and restaurants and master each recipe in a merge craze. Discover every diner, kitchen, home, inn, manor, villa, garden, riverside, house and mansion in town!

Play Cook & Merge free now online!
